nodes.text: A stingfly was a type of insect. According to Thrawn, thousands of stingflies being encouraged to attack a tusklan from all sides would kill the creature. The use of stingflies as a hunting method took time and ruined the pelt of the tusklan, but the hunter remained safe as the tusklan didn't know where the attack came from.
The stingfly is mentioned in the novel Thrawn, which was authored by Timothy Zahn and published in 2017.
